fields.description: If checked, users will not see the Confirm Access dialog.
fields.label: Skip Authorization

fields.description:
A list of resources which the Client App will have access to after the user allows it.
e.g. project
fields.label: Scopes

fields.description:
URIs for receiving authorization code once the user allows access, as well as failure responses. Typically a REST endpoint exposed by the Client App.
e.g. http://hostname/api/method/frappe.integrations.oauth2_logins.login_via_facebook
fields.label: Redirect URIs

fields.description: URL of a web page providing information about the client.
fields.label: Client URI

fields.description: URL that references a logo for the client.
fields.label: Logo URI

fields.description:
Unique ID assigned by the client developer used to identify the client software to be dynamically registered.
Should remain same across multiple versions or updates of the software.
fields.label: Software ID

fields.description:
A version identifier string for the client software.
The value of the should change on any update of the client software with the same Software ID.
fields.label: Software Version

fields.description: URL that points to a human-readable terms of service document for the client. Should be shown to end-user before authorizing.
fields.label: TOS URI

fields.description: URL that points to a human-readable policy document for the client. Should be shown to end-user before authorizing.
fields.label: Policy URI

fields.description: New lines separated list of strings representing ways to contact people responsible for this client, typically email addresses.
fields.label: Contacts

fields.description: Value of "None" implies a public client. In such a case Client Secret is not given to the client and token exchange makes use of PKCE.
fields.label: Token Endpoint Auth Method
